FromFile.description: Path to the file to read the content of and set as Value

ValidateJson.description: Whether or not the content should be a valid JSON

MinimizeJson.description: When set to yes, will load are dump JSON string without indentation

IgnoreInvalidJson.description: If the JSON encoding failed, allows to ignore and use default content

ValidateYaml.description: Whether or not the content should be a valid Yaml

RenderToJson.description: When set to yes, will transform the object loaded in YAML and set it into JSON

IgnoreInvalidYaml.description: If the Yaml encoding failed, allows to ignore and use default content

EncodeToBase64.description: Whether the content should be encoded to base64
